m_szDocSumamry: LOW ENERGY NUCLEAR THERMOELECTRIC SYSTEM WIPO Patent Application WO/2014/146836 A2 Abstract: A low energy nuclear thermoelectric system for a vehicle which provides a cost-effective and sustainable means of transportation for long operation range with zero emission using an onboard low energy nuclear reaction thermal generator. The present invention generally includes a thermal generator within a thermal enclosure case, an energy conversion system linked with the thermal generator, an energy storage system linked with the energy conversion system, a cooling system and a central control system.
